name: kimi-claw
description: OpenClaw connector that bridges a remote /gateway server with the local OpenClaw Gateway.

scripts.build:internal: npm run clean && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json && mkdir -p dist/src && cp src/message-filter.js dist/src/message-filter.js && npm run minify:release
scripts.build:public: npm run clean && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json && mkdir -p dist/src && cp src/message-filter.js dist/src/message-filter.js && npm run minify:release
scripts.minify:release: for file in $(find dist -type f -name '*.js'); do terser "$file" --compress passes=2,dead_code=true,drop_console=true,drop_debugger=true --mangle --format comments=false --output "$file" -- "$file"; done
